mapper.select: /* board-type.list */ select hbtype.hong_board_type_uid as hong_board_type_uid ,hbtype.board_type_cd as board_type_cd ,hcode.code_name as board_type_name ,hbtype.board_name as board_name ,hbtype.comment_yn as comment_yn ,case when hbtype.comment_yn = 'Y' then '사용' else '미사용' end as comment_yn_str ,case when hbtype.file_atch_yn = 'Y' then '사용' else '미사용' end as file_atch_yn_str ,case when hbtype.use_yn = 'Y' then '사용' else '미사용' end as use_yn_str ,hbtype.use_yn as use_yn ,huser.user_name as reg_name ,to_char(hbtype.reg_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as reg_dt from hong_board_type hbtype left join hong_user huser on huser.user_uid = hbtype.reg_id left join hong_code hcode on hcode.code_val = hbtype.board_type_cd and hcode.upper_code_val = 'BOARD_TYPE' and hcode.use_yn = 'Y' and hcode.delete_yn = 'N' where hbtype.delete_yn = 'N'
/* board-type.view */ select hong_board_type_uid ,board_type_cd ,board_name ,comment_yn ,file_atch_yn ,use_yn from hong_board_type where hong_board_type_uid = #{hongBoardTypeUid}
